item.title: Learning Golang (some rough notes) - S02E02 - Adding error handling to the Producer
item.description: I looked last time at the very bare basics of writing a Kafka producer using Go. It worked, but only with everything lined up and pointing the right way. There was no error handling of any sorts. Letâ€™s see about fixing this now.
